item.title: Fiber UI | Accessible & Beautiful React Component Library
item.description: Fiber UI is a modern React component library built with Tailwind CSS and React Aria. Create accessible, customizable, and beautiful UI components for your web projects.

item.title: All Components List | Fiber UI
item.description: Discover the complete library of FiberUI components. Type-safe, accessible, and customizable React components built with Tailwind CSS for modern web applications.

item.title: React Hooks | Fiber UI
item.description: Explore our collection of production-ready React hooks. Includes storage utilities, device hardware access, and a full suite of WebRTC primitives for real-time apps.

item.title: Badge | Fiber UI
item.description: A versatile badge component for displaying status, labels, or counts. Supports multiple variants, sizes, and colors, fully accessible and styled with Tailwind CSS for seamless integration.

item.title: Breadcrumb | Fiber UI
item.description: A responsive breadcrumb navigation component that helps users understand their location in the hierarchy. Features automatic collapsing, custom separators, and full keyboard accessibility support.

item.title: Button | Fiber UI
item.description: A highly customizable button component with support for various variants, sizes, and loading states. Built for accessibility and easy styling with Tailwind CSS utility classes.

item.title: Card | Fiber UI
item.description: A flexible card component for displaying grouped content like headers, images, and footers. Perfect for dashboards, profiles, and listings, with built-in dark mode and responsiveness.

item.title: Checkbox | Fiber UI
item.description: An accessible checkbox component for forms and selection lists. Supports indeterminate states, custom styling, and keyboard navigation, built on top of React Aria primitives.

item.title: ColorArea | Fiber UI
item.description: A sophisticated color area component for selecting 2D color values. Features accessible keyboard navigation, touch support, and seamless integration with other color primitives.

item.title: ColorWheel | Fiber UI
item.description: An interactive circular color wheel for selecting hue values. Supports keyboard operation, touch input, and precise control, ideal for building comprehensive color pickers.

item.title: Input | Fiber UI
item.description: A highly versatile input component for text fields, search boxes, and forms. Includes support for prefixes, suffixes, validation states, and accessible labels.

item.title: Label | Fiber UI
item.description: An accessible label component for associating text with form controls. Ensures proper reading order and focus management for improved assistive technology support.

item.title: Loader | Fiber UI
item.description: A customizable loading spinner and progress indicator. signals wait times effectively with smooth animations and multiple size and color variants.

item.title: Pagination | Fiber UI
item.description: A powerful pagination component for navigating large datasets. Includes page buttons, navigation controls, and page size selectors with full keyboard support.

item.title: Popover | Fiber UI
item.description: A floating popover component for displaying rich content triggered by user interaction. Features focus trapping, automatic positioning, and dismiss-on-outside-click behavior.

item.title: Select | Fiber UI
item.description: A feature-rich select dropdown component. Supports single and multiple selection, sections, custom item rendering, and fully accessible keyboard navigation.

item.title: Separator | Fiber UI
item.description: A stylistic separator component for dividing content sections. Supports horizontal and vertical orientations with customizable thickness and semantic roles.

item.title: Skeleton | Fiber UI
item.description: An animated skeleton loader for simulating content layout while data is fetching. Improves perceived performance by reducing layout shift and visual jarring.

item.title: Slider | Fiber UI
item.description: A fully accessible slider component for selecting values within a range. Supports single or multiple thumbs, custom formatting, and keyboard interaction.

item.title: Switch | Fiber UI
item.description: An accessible toggle switch for binary states. Supports custom labels, sizes, and colors, with smooth animations and full keyboard accessibility.

item.title: Tabs | Fiber UI
item.description: A flexible tabs component for organizing content into sections. Features automatic activation, keyboard navigation, and customizable styling for active states.

item.title: Textarea | Fiber UI
item.description: An auto-resizing textarea component for multi-line text input. Includes support for validation error states, accessible labeling, and custom styling.

item.title: Toast | Fiber UI
item.description: A lightweight toast notification system for displaying temporary alerts. Supports multiple positions, auto-dismissal, and custom content rendering.

item.title: Tooltip | Fiber UI
item.description: An informational tooltip component that appears on hover or focus. Fully accessible with smart positioning to keep content visible within the viewport.

item.title: useFileSystem | Fiber UI
item.description: A powerful storage hook for reading, writing, and managing files directly on the user's local file system using the modern File System Access API.

item.title: useIndexedDB | Fiber UI
item.description: A React hook for persisting data in IndexedDB. Provides a simple API for storing large structured data sets asynchronously in the browser.

item.title: useLocalStorageState | Fiber UI
item.description: A React hook that persists state to localStorage with automatic cross-tab synchronization. Handles serialization, hydration, and server-side rendering compatibility out of the box.

item.title: useSessionStorageState | Fiber UI
item.description: A React hook for managing state in sessionStorage. Preserves data across page reloads within the same tab, perfect for temporary form data or wizard progress.

item.title: Intro to WebRTC Hooks | Fiber UI
item.description: A comprehensive guide to the FiberUI WebRTC React Hooks stack. Learn how to build production-ready real-time communication apps with composable React hooks.

item.title: useAudioLevel | Fiber UI
item.description: A visualization hook for analyzing audio volume in real-time. Detects speaking activity and provides raw volume data, perfect for building audio meters and active speaker indicators.

item.title: useDataChannel | Fiber UI
item.description: A React hook for managing WebRTC Data Channels. Enables low-latency peer-to-peer exchange of text, binary data, and JSON for chat or gaming applications.

item.title: usePeerConnection | Fiber UI
item.description: The core WebRTC hook for managing peer connections, handling the complex lifecycle of SDP negotiation, ICE candidate exchange, and connection state management for robust P2P communication.

item.title: useScreenShare | Fiber UI
item.description: A simplified hook for capturing screen content. Provides easy access to display media streams for sharing screens, windows, or browser tabs in your application.

item.title: useTrackToggle | Fiber UI
item.description: A media control hook for muting and unmuting audio or video tracks. Toggles media availability without stopping the underlying stream, ideal for meeting controls.

item.title: useUserMedia | Fiber UI
item.description: A hook for accessing and managing the user's camera and microphone. Handles permission requests, device constraints, and stream lifecycle management effortlessly.

item.title: useClipboard | Fiber UI
item.description: A utility hook for reading and writing to the system clipboard. simplifies copy-to-clipboard functionality with built-in state management for feedback indicators.

item.title: useCountdown | Fiber UI
item.description: A comprehensive timer hook for countdowns and intervals. Supports start, stop, pause, and reset controls with high precision and customizable callback intervals.

item.title: useCounter | Fiber UI
item.description: A versatile hook for managing numeric values with min/max limits. Includes convenient helpers for increment, decrement, and reset, making it ideal for quantity pickers.

item.title: useDebouncedCallback | Fiber UI
item.description: A performance optimization hook that delays function execution. Perfect for handling high-frequency events like search inputs or window resizing without impacting UI responsiveness.

item.title: useDebouncedState | Fiber UI
item.description: A hook that delays updating a state value until a specified time has passed. Essential for reducing API calls and expensive re-renders during rapid user input.

item.title: useEyeDropper | Fiber UI
item.description: A specialized utility hook for selecting colors from anywhere on the screen using the modern EyeDropper API, providing hex color codes effortlessly.

item.title: useIsMounted | Fiber UI
item.description: A utility hook to solve hydration mismatch issues. Returns true only after the component has mounted on the client, ensuring safe access to browser APIs.

item.title: usePictureInPicture | Fiber UI
item.description: A comprehensive hook for managing Picture-in-Picture mode for video elements, allowing creating floating video players that persist while multitasking.

item.title: useShare | Fiber UI
item.description: A cross-platform utility hook for invoking the native share sheet on mobile and desktop, enabling effortless content sharing with optional fallbacks.

item.title: useThrottledCallback | Fiber UI
item.description: A hook that limits the rate at which a function activates. Ideal for optimizing scroll listeners and mouse movement handlers by enforcing a maximum execution frequency.

item.title: useThrottledState | Fiber UI
item.description: A hook for throttling state updates to improve performance. Ensures that state changes only propagate at a controlled rate, preventing UI lag during rapid updates.

item.title: useBattery | Fiber UI
item.description: A React hook for monitoring device battery status. Provides real-time updates on charging state, level, and charging/discharging times via the Battery Status API.

item.title: useDeviceOrientation | Fiber UI
item.description: A comprehensive hook to access the device's physical orientation and tilt angles (alpha, beta, gamma) relative to the Earth's frame of reference.

item.title: useGeolocation | Fiber UI
item.description: A React hook for accessing the Geolocation API. Retrieves current coordinates, handles permission states, and tracks position changes in real-time.

item.title: useMediaDevices | Fiber UI
item.description: A powerful hook for enumerating and managing connected media devices. Lists cameras, microphones, and speakers with real-time updates when devices are connected or removed.

item.title: useNetwork | Fiber UI
item.description: A hook that monitors network connectivity status. Provides real-time updates on online/offline state and connection details like effective type and downlink speed.

item.title: useWakeLock | Fiber UI
item.description: A specialized device hook that leverages the Screen Wake Lock API to prevent the device screen from dimming or turning off during usage.
